author: appliedblockchain
title: Trustless Cardano Ethereum bridge
description: Untenable fees have led to a liquidity migration from Ethereum. Applied Blockchain "London Bridge" will route liquidity to Cardano.
solution: The trustless bridge will enable users to move standard tokens from Ethereum to Cardano providing a more active ecosystem for DeFi and NFT's
experience: We've deployed 100+ blockchain smart contract DApps: NFT marketplaces, DeFi protocols, project launchpads, derivatives trading platforms.
